commands.name: az iot ops asset endpoint delete
commands.syntax:
az iot ops asset endpoint delete --name
                                 --resource-group
examples: az iot ops asset endpoint delete --name myprofile -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops asset endpoint query
commands.summary: Query the Resource Graph for asset endpoint profiles.
commands.syntax:
az iot ops asset endpoint query [--am {Anonymous, Certificate, UsernamePassword}]
                                [--cq]
                                [--endpoint-profile-type]
                                [--ig]
                                [--instance]
                                [--location]
                                [--name]
                                [--resource-group]
                                [--ta]
examples: az iot ops asset endpoint query --authentication-mode Anonymous
az iot ops asset endpoint query --target-address opc.tcp://opcplc-000000:50000 --instance myinstance

commands.name: az iot ops asset endpoint show
commands.syntax:
az iot ops asset endpoint show --name
                               --resource-group
examples: az iot ops asset endpoint show --name myprofile -g myresourcegroup

commands.name: az iot ops asset endpoint update
commands.syntax:
az iot ops asset endpoint update --name
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--am {Anonymous, Certificate, UsernamePassword}]
                                 [--cert-ref]
                                 [--cr]
                                 [--pass-ref]
                                 [--pr]
                                 [--ta]
                                 [--tags]
                                 [--ur]
                                 [--user-ref]
examples: az iot ops asset endpoint update --name myprofile -g myresourcegroup --authentication-mode Anonymous

az iot ops asset endpoint update --name myAssetEndpoint -g myRG --username-ref "aio-opc-ua-broker-user-authentication/opc-plc-username" --password-ref "aio-opc-ua-broker-user-authentication/opc-plc-password"
